text: Johannes Juliaan Gijsbert "Hans" Jansen (17 November 1942 - 5 May 2015) was a Dutch scholar of contemporary Islam and politician in the Netherlands.Arabist en PVV-er Hans Jansen overleden NOS May 5, 2015 He was born in Amsterdam. Until his death he was a Member of the European Parliament for the political party Party for Freedom. Jansen died of a stroke at the age of 72. ==References== ==Other websites== *His website, partially in English contains a list of publications and a CV. *Interview at religioscope site Category:1942 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Dutch academics Category:Dutch Roman Catholics Category:MEPs for the Netherlands Category:Party for Freedom politicians Category:Politicians from Amsterdam Category:Writers from Amsterdam
title: Hans Jansen
